title: Tenant Reports Leaky Faucet
description: A tenant reports a leaky faucet in their bathroom. The property manager must log the issue and dispatch a plumber.

tasks.description: Identify the tenant and their property address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the tenant account and associated property.

tasks.description: Create a new maintenance work order in the property management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is created with the issue 'Leaky Faucet' and a 'High' priority.

tasks.description: Assign the work order to the approved plumbing vendor and notify the tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: The work order is dispatched to 'Pro Plumbers' and an automated notification is sent to the tenant.
